name: Marienne, Frostbound Vicar
description: An elegant female frost knight with silver-blue long hair, wielding a crystal rapier. She wears ice crystal armor, standing still in a snow-covered ruined cathedral, snowflakes quietly falling around her. Guardian of the extreme cold seal, once froze an army of the dead with a single strike.
description_ch: 一位優雅的女性霜之騎士，有著銀藍色的長髮，手持一把水晶細劍。她身穿冰晶鎧甲，靜立於白雪覆蓋的毀壞教堂之中，雪花在身邊靜靜飄落。守護極寒封印，曾以一劍凍結亡者之軍。
